urls.description: Children are our role models and the importance of play has been at the heart of our business ever since 1932 when the company was founded. Today we are more than 17.000 colleagues worldwide, working to bring LEGO® play to children everywhere and guided by our mission – to inspire and develop the builders of tomorrow.’ If our mission energizes you, come and help us make a positive impact on the lives of children, our colleagues, our communities and the planet. At the LEGO Group we believe Everyone is
urls.title: Home - Careers - LEGO.com

1697620505514139782.text: @ciamaulex Siamo felici di sapere che abbiamo potuto aiutare. Se desideri unirti al nostro team, tieni d'occhio la pagina https://t.co/BsjG1eIt5b per controllare le posizioni aperte. Buona fortuna! 🍀😊
